thread.title: BTIG Names Matthew Partain Head of Prime Brokerage Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: BTIG Names Matthew Partain Head of Prime Brokerage Sales
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- BTIG, LLC announced today that it has named Matthew Partain the Head of Prime Brokerage Sales. Mr. Partain will join BTIG Prime Brokerage’s senior leadership team in supporting the ambitions of emerging fund managers and the ongoing needs of established funds. He will lead a team of experienced prime brokerage sales professionals regionally staffed in target markets.
Since joining BTIG in 2010, Mr. Partain has successfully onboarded several important clients and cultivated valuable long-term relationships. He will now be tasked with building out BTIG’s presence in key regions in the U.S. and beyond. Mr. Partain will continue to report jointly to Brian Petitt and Justin Press, Co-Heads of BTIG Prime Brokerage .
Today, BTIG has a record number of prime brokerage clients, and their collective assets under management are the largest in the firm’s history. “With 15 years of Prime Brokerage experience, Matt is highly regarded by our institutional clients and fully understands their needs,” noted Mr. Petitt . “He is a proven leader within the firm, and the ideal fit to manage the expansion of our high-touch sales force and our rapidly-growing client base.”
BTIG offers solutions for hedge funds, family offices and separately managed accounts. Clients directly benefit from BTIG’s operations, systems and trading expertise. BTIG Prime Brokerage provides multi-asset class outsource trading, a sophisticated reporting platform, access to capital introduction, and custody and clearing through fully-disclosed introducing broker relationships with Goldman Sachs & Co. LLC and Pershing, a BNY Mellon company.
“We continue to earn mandates from some of the industry’s premier and more established funds, who understand the value of our robust trading desk, research, technology and operational capabilities,” said Mr. Press . “With a growing number of new managers turning to us to support their needs, Matt will play a pivotal role in helping them achieve their business goals.”
About BTIG
BTIG is a global financial services firm specializing in institutional trading, investment banking, research and related brokerage services. With an extensive global footprint and more than 550 employees, BTIG, LLC and its affiliates operate out of 17 cities throughout the U.S., and in Europe, Asia and Australia. BTIG offers execution, expertise and insights for equities, equity derivatives, ETFs and fixed income, currency and commodities (futures, commodities, foreign exchange, interest rates, credit, and convertible and preferred securities). The firm’s core capabilities include global execution, portfolio, electronic and outsource trading, transition management, investment banking, prime brokerage, capital introduction, corporate access, research and strategy, commission management and more.
To learn more about BTIG, visit https://www.btig.com/ .
